Articles.Content:
Hello, my name is Daniel

I have been playing KSP for a few months now but I for my more complex missions i need to be able to control multiple vehicles at once.

I know that Telemachus and kOS can help but i was wondering is there any other mods like these?

thanks for any help

something like this? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75170

Edit: not sure if this works in 1.0.4

Edited November 6, 2015 by wasml
